Player History
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 3/3/1987 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 8/10/1988 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Traded from Montreal to Detroit on 6/25/1989 (Going to MON: P Shane Reynolds. Going to DET: C Todd Hundley)...
Injured on 5/18/1990 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/11/1991, off Pascual Perez (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/12/1991, off Les Straker (BOS)...
Traded from Detroit to Philadelphia on 7/20/1992 (Going to PHI: P Sterling Hitchcock, C Todd Hundley. Going to DET: P Sid Fernandez)...
